'''Darcy''' is a young girl who surrendered her baby after she was born.

==History==
Darcy gave birth in her house alone because she didn't want to tell her mother she was pregnant. She climbed on the top bunk and played her music really loudly to cover the noise. When the baby was born, she clipped the cord with a barrette. She called the Safe Surrender hotline and Pete and Addison came to pick up the baby. Darcy worried because the baby wasn't crying at all. Addison offered to do an exam, but Darcy declined, saying they just needed to take the baby and go. Addison gave Darcy her card and the matching bracelet and they left with the baby.

Darcy later showed up at the practice with her mother, who was horrified that Darcy had given her baby away. They reunited her with the baby, whom she named Melanie, and they took her home.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
Darcy's mother was unaware that she was pregnant and had given birth. When she found out, she and Darcy came to the practice to pick up the baby, saying she would never let Darcy give up her baby. Once they were reunited, Darcy named her baby Melanie.
